channel.title: Loyalty rank to chatbox
channel.description: Hey I added the loyalty ranks like in runescape the ones that are like sir, lady, lord, etc. and I wanted to know how to add it to the chatbox because right now it only shows it when you right click the player I know I have to do something in the buildpublicchat method but idk how :S. Here is the tut I used: [url=http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?55476-PI-Ranks-like-loyalty-programme-PI]http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?55476-PI-Ranks-like-loyalty-programme-PI[/url]

item.title: Loyalty rank to chatbox
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

Hey I added the loyalty ranks like in runescape the ones that are like sir, lady, lord, etc. and I wanted to know how to add it to the chatbox because right now it only shows it when you right click the player I know I have to do something in the buildpublicchat method but idk how :S. Here is the tut I used:
http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?55476-PI-Ranks-like-loyalty-programme-PI

Read full topic
